summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6192 for the improvement of 44th Avenue South from Othello Street to Myrtle Street; by constructing sanitary sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87591, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
